text:
<?xml version='1.0'?>
<data>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Categories</name>
        <description>Returns a list of all available categories and category aliases</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/categories</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Endpoints</name>
        <description>Returns a list of all endpoints and how to use them</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/endpoints</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Flags</name>
        <description>Returns a list of all available blacklist flags</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/flags</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Formats</name>
        <description>Returns a list of all available response file formats</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/formats</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Info</name>
        <description>Returns a lot of information about JokeAPI and its jokes</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/info</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Joke</name>
        <description>Returns a joke from the specified category / categories that is also matching the provided (optional) filters</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/joke/{CATEGORY}</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>safe-mode</param>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>blacklistFlags</param>
                <param>type</param>
                <param>contains</param>
                <param>idRange</param>
                <param>lang</param>
                <param>amount</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>LangCodes</name>
        <description>Returns the language code of the specified language</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/langcode/{LANGUAGE}</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Languages</name>
        <description>Returns a list of supported and partially supported languages</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/languages</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Ping</name>
        <description>Can be used to check if JokeAPI is online</description>
        <usage>
            <method>GET</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/ping</url>
            <supportedParams>
                <param>format</param>
                <param>lang</param>
            </supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
    <endpoint>
        <name>Submit</name>
        <description>Used to submit a joke to be added to JokeAPI</description>
        <usage>
            <method>POST</method>
            <url>https://v2.jokeapi.dev/submit</url>
            <supportedParams>dry-run</supportedParams>
        </usage>
    </endpoint>
</data>

    <endpoint>
